scripts.build:staging: tsc && npm run robots:staging && vite build --mode staging
scripts.build:production: tsc && npm run robots:production && vite build --mode production
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && firebase deploy -P staging
scripts.robots:staging: node -e "require('fs').copyFile('robots/robots-staging.txt', 'public/robots.txt', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Staging robots.txt generated.') })"
scripts.robots:production: node -e "require('fs').unlink('public/robots.txt', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Robots file deleted') })"
